p.style: letter-spacing: normal; margin-bottom: 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-weight: bold; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 20px; line-height: inherit; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px 0px 5px; border: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 20px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; min-height: 1px; background: none; list-style-type: disc;

ul.li: ALL OUR KIDS is a collaborative project to provide "Grab and Go" breakfast and lunch meals for students while schools are not in session. Check the ALL OUR KIDS website for locations and hours by clicking here.

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px 0px 5px; border: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 20px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; min-height: 1px; background: none; list-style-type: disc;

ul.li: St. Louis Area Food-bank pantry finder, by zip code

ul.li: United Way COVID-19 resource page for area offerings

ul.li: Mercy Neighborhood Resources service providers as well as food pantries; you can find that here.

ul.li: Some area businesses, will be providing meals for kids. You can find more details here.

p.style: margin-bottom: 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-weight: bold; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 20px; line-height: inherit; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);

ul.li: Charter is offering free access to spectrum broadband and wi-fi for families with school-aged children. Details here.

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px 0px 5px; border: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 20px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; min-height: 1px; background: none; list-style-type: disc;

ul.li: Ameren is suspending all disconnections for non-payment and forgiving late payment fees for residential and business customers. Details here.

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px 0px 5px; border: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 20px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; min-height: 1px; background: none; list-style-type: disc;

ul.li: Spire is suspending all disconnections and late fees until May 1. Details here.

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px 0px 5px; border: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 20px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; min-height: 1px; background: none; list-style-type: disc;

ul.li: MO American Water is suspending disconnects and reconnecting those who are currently shut off. Detail here.

ul.li: Urban League: 314-615-3640

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px 0px 5px; border: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 20px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; min-height: 1px; background: none; list-style-type: disc;

ul.li: Salvation Army: 314-646-3000

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px 0px 5px; border: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 20px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; min-height: 1px; background: none; list-style-type: disc;

ul.li: Community Action Agency: 314-863-0015

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px 0px 5px; border: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 20px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; min-height: 1px; background: none; list-style-type: disc;

ul.li: United Way: 211, 1-800-427-4626; their COVID-19 dedicated page has additional information

p.style: margin-bottom: 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-weight: bold; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 20px; line-height: inherit; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);

ul.li: United Way: 211, 1-800-427-4626; their COVID-19 dedicated page has additional information

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px 0px 5px; border: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 20px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; min-height: 1px; background: none; list-style-type: disc;

ul.li: Urban League: 314-615-3640

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px 0px 5px; border: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 20px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; min-height: 1px; background: none; list-style-type: disc;

ul.li: Salvation Army: 314-646-3000 (funds are based on zip code)

p.style: margin-bottom: 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-weight: bold; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 20px; line-height: inherit; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);

ul.style: margin: 0px 0px 18px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 15px; border: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 14.6028px; line-height: inherit; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline; list-style: outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px 0px 5px; border: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 20px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; min-height: 1px; background: none; list-style-type: disc;

ul.li: Youth In Need: Youth in need can access help 24 hours a day at the St. Louis County Youth Connection Helpline at 314-628-2929. Telehealth counseling options have been implemented due to COVID-19.

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px 0px 5px; border: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 20px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; min-height: 1px; background: none; list-style-type: disc;

ul.li: KUTO (Kids Under TwentyOne) Crisis Helpline: Youth friendly 24/7 crisis hotline. (314/888) 644-5886

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px 0px 5px; border: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 20px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; min-height: 1px; background: none; list-style-type: disc;

ul.li: Safe Connections: Crisis hotline for women who have experienced domestic violence, sexual assault or childhood sexual abuse; 24-hour crisis hotline: 314 531-2003

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px 0px 5px; border: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 20px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; min-height: 1px; background: none; list-style-type: disc;

ul.li: Domestic Violence and Rape Hotline: 800 392-0210

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px 0px 5px; border: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 20px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; min-height: 1px; background: none; list-style-type: disc;

ul.li: Behavioral Health Response: Confidential telephone counseling to people in mental health crises as well as mobile outreach services, community referral services and critical incident stress management (CISM). 1 800 811-4760 (hotline)

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px 0px 5px; border: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 20px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; min-height: 1px; background: none; list-style-type: disc;

ul.li: Life Crisis-Suicide/Crisis Hotline: 314 647-4357

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px 0px 5px; border: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 20px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; min-height: 1px; background: none; list-style-type: disc;

ul.li: National Suicide Prevention Lifeline: 1 800 273-TALK (8255)

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px 0px 5px; border: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 20px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; min-height: 1px; background: none; list-style-type: disc;

ul.li: Hopeline Network: 1 800 SUICIDE (784-2433)

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px 0px 5px; border: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 20px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; min-height: 1px; background: none; list-style-type: disc;

ul.li: Mid-Missouri Crisis Line: 1 888 761-4357 or text “HAND” to 839863

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px 0px 5px; border: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 20px; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; min-height: 1px; background: none; list-style-type: disc;

ul.li: SAMHSA Disaster Distress Helpline: 24/7, 365-day-a- year crisis counseling and support to people experiencing emotional distress related to natural or human-caused disasters. 1 800 985-5990
